Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires persons licensed to sell alcoholic beverages for consumption on the premises to display a sign or poster on dangers of alcohol consumption while pregnant
Summary: Requires persons licensed to sell any alcoholic beverage for consumption on the premises to display a sign or poster on the dangers of alcohol consumption while pregnant; provides that the commissioner of health shall prepare and distribute the sign or poster to such license holders.
LawCode: Add ยง2503-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to posting of alcohol consumption warning signs
